description: A well paved easy pathway along side Hiway #1 running from Canmore, past Harvie Heights, to Banff Park East gates.  An OK way to spend a few hours walking if you want an easy to access, scenic trail close to a major highway.  8.4km each way.
directions: Anywhere along the North side of Hiway #1 between Canmore Benchlands Drive and Banff Park East Gates.
title: Canmore, Harvie Heights to Banff Park East Gate
